Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 7 from any)
Bardic Lore: Can use Bardic Lore to attempt to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item
Fascinating Performance: Can fascinate a target for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make an Impression
Legendary Performer: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the audience level when Earning Income using Performance
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Bard: 17 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Hand Crossbow (+5 1d6 P R60'; dexterity; trained); Hatchet (+6 1d6+1 S R10'; strength; trained); Scimitar (+6 1d6+1 S; strength; trained)

Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1): (2) TODO
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Sure Strike (O1): (1) Self uses the better of two attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Enigma: Knows the Sure Strike occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Directed Audience: Can redirect the emanation of a composition spell into a cone up to 10' or twice the area
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 3 available vs. 4 allocated
Legendary Performer Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15, performance rank (currently 1) >= 4 and virtuosic performer feature (currently 1)
